data.question: How do I play a song?
data.answer: Just click the play button on any song for a nonstop experience featuring our latest collections.

data.question: How do I search for an album?
data.answer: Click the search bar, type your favorite album name, and click it to navigate to its page filled with your favorite records.

data.question: What variety of albums does Qtify offer?
data.answer: Qtify offers one of the largest varieties of songs, ranging from Texan jingles to Mediterranean tunes, all available at one click!

data.question: Why should I use Qtify instead of other music apps?
data.answer: Qtify offers curated lists of albums from our latest collections, perfectly matching your mood.
